name: Indian Traditional Makeover
description:
Let’s play amazing new Indian Traditional Makeover game for all ages. For Wedding Indian culture is hot favourite amongst all countries. So are you ready for play this best makeover game?

Help to Indian girls for her wedding. There are so many different levels. Play one by one and unlock new levels. This all levels are also free. Every Indian Girl wan’t to look like bridal fashion girls in her own wedding.

Make me beautiful look with used of thousand of attractive items for decoration. In this game we are cover more then attractive levels with HD stunning graphics. There are so many various treatment for bridal like spa, hair spa, make up, mehndi, dress up and so many more.

Top Features:
===========
 HD beautiful graphics with Indian Doll Character.
- Easy to play and apply all tools.
- Most relaxing spa with number of tools.
- Number of glamorous makeup options!
- Wonderful henna/mehndi designs
- Attractive ornaments like bangles, necklaces, earrings, nose rings etc.
- So many different levels.
- Share your design with your friends and family.

So are you ready for play this game? Download Now…
